src:
Deutsche Bank bemötte ”kollapsinlägg” från kontroversiell finansblogg
Under tisdagen publicerade den kontroversiella finansbloggen Zero Hedge med tillhörande Twitterkonto ett inlägg där Deutsche Bank målades upp som nästa Lehman Brothers. Bankens sociala medier-team var snabba med att bemöta anklagelserna.
06 Nov 2019, 19:07 by Di

text:
Deutsche Bank responded to "collapse posts" from controversial finance blogs
On Tuesday, the controversial finance blog Zero Hedge and its Twitter account published a post in which Deutsche Bank was painted as the next Lehman Brothers. The bank's social media team was quick to respond to the charges.
06 Nov 2019, 19:07 by Tue
